Class ProjectedInventory

java.lang.Object
com.soulfiremc.server.pathfinding.graph.ProjectedInventory
public final class ProjectedInventory extends Object
An immutable representation of a player inventory. This takes an inventory and projects places/breaks onto it. This way we calculate the way we can do actions after a block was broken/placed.
